PAD_RecognisedSharTemple.synopsis: When the player first enters the Shar Temple they roll History to recognise it as the Gauntlet of Shar - an infamous training ground. If the player is Shadowheart, a Sharran, or a Selunite they automatically succeed
PAD_RecognisedSharTemple.how_to_trigger: Enter the Shar Temple for the first time

PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_0.speaker: Player
PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_0.text: Some sort of temple? Looks abandoned.

PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_1.speaker: Player
PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_1.text: A Sharran structure, going by the design.

PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_2.speaker: Player
PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_2.text: A temple to Lady Shar. It almost seems like... no, surely it can't be.
PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_2.context: NodeContext: Starting to vocalise a sneaking suspicion that this temple is a legendary Sharran site, before dismissing the thought.

PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_3.speaker: Player
PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_3.text: The Gauntlet of Shar, before my very eyes... the Dark Lady guided me here. She wanted me to find this place.
PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_3.context: NodeContext: Overawed. Previously had great conviction that she was on track to find something, and it turned out to be a legendary Sharran proving ground

PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_4.speaker: Player
PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_4.text: I suspected there was something to be found, but this... the Gauntlet of Shar. I can scarcely believe my own eyes...
PAD_RecognisedSharTemple_4.context: NodeContext: Overawed. Previously suspected she was on track to find something, and it turned out to be a legendary Sharran proving ground
